page.title: 04MY SCHOOL
page.content: MY SCHOOL IS CALLED A COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL BECAUSE IT IS SUPPOSED TO PROVIDE AN ALL ROUND EDUCATION SUITED TO THE NEEDS AND ABILITIES OF THE PUPILS.THIS MEANS THAT WE CAN MAKE SOME DECISIONS IN THE CHOICE OF SUBJECTS THAT WE FOLLOW. WE START AT 0845 IN THE MORNING AND END AT 1530 WITH ONE BREAK OF 20 MINUTES AND ONE HOUR FOR LUNCH. LUNCHTIME IS VERY LATE BY WHICH TIME I AM USUALLY QUITE HUNGRY. WE HAVE A LOT OF DIFFERENT LESSONS TO GO TO BUT I DO NOT LIKE THEM ALL.WE ALL HAVE TO DO ENGLISH AND MATHS BUT WE ARE NOW LEARNING TO USE COMPUTERS. I HAVE GOT A COMPUTER OF MY OWN.
